posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ What I got ++ Many Mid-Tiers
posts.post_content:
Instead of a long post with a bunch of scans and prices, I'll keep it short.

What I have for sale (or TRADE) is pretty much up on my ebay page ---> sg713.

If you'd like, check it out.  If something catches you're eye, maybe we can work something out with better prices, of course :).

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Link usually doesn't work, but got to try:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=372357805393&hash=item56b2413551%3Ag%3APyUAAOSwNOJbPTvj&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]
